verses.verse: בְּ֭נִי <WH1121> My son תּוֹרָתִ֣י <WH8451> not my law אַל־ <WH408> not תִּשְׁכָּ֑ח <WH7911> forget וּ֝מִצְוֹתַ֗י <WH4687> my commandments יִצֹּ֥ר <WH5341> keep לִבֶּֽךָ׃ <WH3820> but let thine heart
כִּ֤י <WH3588> For אֹ֣רֶךְ <WH753> For length יָ֭מִים <WH3117> of days וּשְׁנ֣וֹת <WH8141> and long חַיִּ֑ים <WH2416> life וְ֝שָׁל֗וֹם <WH7965> and peace יוֹסִ֥יפוּ <WH3254> shall they add לָֽךְ׃

חֶ֥סֶד <WH2617> Let not mercy וֶאֱמֶ֗ת <WH571> and truth אַֽל־ <WH408> nay יַעַ֫זְבֻ֥ךָ <WH5800> forsake קָשְׁרֵ֥ם <WH7194> thee bind עַל־ <WH5921> around גַּרְגְּרוֹתֶ֑יךָ <WH1621> them about thy neck כָּ֝תְבֵ֗ם <WH3789> write עַל־ <WH5921> around ל֥וּחַ <WH3871> them upon the table לִבֶּֽךָ׃ <WH3820> of thine heart

וּמְצָא־ <WH4672> So shalt thou find חֵ֖ן <WH2580> favour וְשֵֽׂכֶל־ <WH7922> understanding ט֑וֹב <WH2896> and good בְּעֵינֵ֖י <WH5869> in the sight אֱלֹהִ֣ים <WH430> of God וְאָדָֽם׃ <WH120> and man פ

בְּטַ֣ח <WH982> Trust אֶל־ <WH413> in יְ֭הוָה <WH3068> in the LORD בְּכָל־ <WH3605> all לִבֶּ֑ךָ <WH3820> with all thine heart וְאֶל־ <WH413> on בִּֽ֝ינָתְךָ֗ <WH998> not unto thine own understanding אַל־ <WH408> not תִּשָּׁעֵֽן׃ <WH8172> and lean
בְּכָל־ <WH3605> all דְּרָכֶ֥יךָ <WH1870> In all thy ways דָעֵ֑הוּ <WH3045> acknowledge וְ֝ה֗וּא <WH1931> and He יְיַשֵּׁ֥ר <WH3474> him and he shall direct אֹֽרְחֹתֶֽיךָ׃ <WH734> thy paths

אַל־ <WH408> nay תְּהִ֣י <WH1961> become חָכָ֣ם <WH2450> Be not wise בְּעֵינֶ֑יךָ <WH5869> in thine own eyes יְרָ֥א <WH3372> fear אֶת־ <WH853> יְ֝הוָ֗ה <WH3069> God וְס֣וּר <WH5493> and depart מֵרָֽע׃ <WH7451> from evil
רִ֭פְאוּת <WH7500> It shall be health תְּהִ֣י <WH1961> become לְשָׁרֶּ֑ךָ <WH8270> to thy navel וְ֝שִׁקּ֗וּי <WH8250> and marrow לְעַצְמוֹתֶֽיךָ׃ <WH6106> to thy bones

כַּבֵּ֣ד <WH3513> Honour אֶת־ <WH853> יְ֭הוָה <WH3068> the LORD מֵהוֹנֶ֑ךָ <WH1952> with thy substance וּ֝מֵרֵאשִׁ֗ית <WH7225> and with the firstfruits כָּל־ <WH3605> of all תְּבוּאָתֶֽךָ׃ <WH8393> of all thine increase

וְיִמָּלְא֣וּ <WH4390> be filled אֲסָמֶ֣יךָ <WH618> So shall thy barns שָׂבָ֑ע <WH7647> with plenty וְ֝תִיר֗וֹשׁ <WH8492> with new wine יְקָבֶ֥יךָ <WH3342> and thy presses יִפְרֹֽצוּ׃ <WH6555> shall burst out פ

מוּסַ֣ר <WH4148> not the chastening יְ֭הוָה <WH3068> of the LORD בְּנִ֣י <WH1121> My son אַל־ <WH408> not תִּמְאָ֑ס <WH3988> despise וְאַל־ <WH408> not תָּ֝קֹ֗ץ <WH6973> neither be weary בְּתוֹכַחְתּֽוֹ׃ <WH8433> of his correction

כִּ֤י <WH3588> for אֶ֥ת <WH853> אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> whom יֶאֱהַ֣ב <WH157> loveth יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> For whom the LORD יוֹכִ֑יחַ <WH3198> he correcteth וּ֝כְאָ֗ב <WH1> even as a father אֶת־ <WH853> בֵּ֥ן <WH1121> the son יִרְצֶֽה׃ <WH7521> [in whom] he delighteth

אַשְׁרֵ֣י <WH835> Happy אָ֭דָם <WH120> [is] the man מָצָ֣א <WH4672> [that] findeth חָכְמָ֑ה <WH2451> wisdom וְ֝אָדָ֗ם <WH120> and the man יָפִ֥יק <WH6329> [that] getteth תְּבוּנָֽה׃ <WH8394> understanding

כִּ֤י <WH3588> for ט֣וֹב <WH2896> of it [is] better סַ֭חְרָהּ <WH5504> For the merchandise מִסְּחַר־ <WH5505> than the merchandise כָּ֑סֶף <WH3701> of silver וּ֝מֵחָר֗וּץ <WH2742> thereof than fine gold תְּבוּאָתָֽהּ׃ <WH8393> and the gain

יְקָ֣רָה <WH3368> She [is] more precious הִ֭יא <WH1931> he [מִפְּנִיִּים כ] (מִפְּנִינִ֑ים <WH6443> ruby ק) וְכָל־ <WH3605> you חֲ֝פָצֶ֗יךָ <WH2656> and all the things thou canst desire לֹ֣א <WH3808> not יִֽשְׁווּ־ <WH7737> are not to be compared בָֽהּ׃
אֹ֣רֶךְ <WH753> Length יָ֭מִים <WH3117> of days בִּֽימִינָ֑הּ <WH3225> [is] in her right hand בִּ֝שְׂמֹאולָ֗הּ <WH8040> [and] in her left hand עֹ֣שֶׁר <WH6239> riches וְכָבֽוֹד׃ <WH3519> and honour
דְּרָכֶ֥יהָ <WH1870> Her ways דַרְכֵי־ <WH1870> [are] ways נֹ֑עַם <WH5278> of pleasantness וְֽכָל־ <WH3605> and all נְתִ֖יבוֹתֶ֣יהָ <WH5410> and all her paths שָׁלֽוֹם׃ <WH7965> [are] peace

עֵץ־ <WH6086> She [is] a tree חַיִּ֣ים <WH2416> of life הִ֭יא <WH1931> who לַמַּחֲזִיקִ֣ים <WH2388> to them that lay hold בָּ֑הּ וְֽתֹמְכֶ֥יהָ <WH8551> [is every one] that retaineth מְאֻשָּֽׁר׃ <WH833> upon her and happy פ

יְֽהוָ֗ה <WH3068> The LORD בְּחָכְמָ֥ה <WH2451> by wisdom יָֽסַד־ <WH3245> hath founded אָ֑רֶץ <WH776> the earth כּוֹנֵ֥ן <WH3559> hath he established שָׁ֝מַ֗יִם <WH8064> the heavens בִּתְבוּנָֽה׃ <WH8394> by understanding
בְּ֭דַעְתּוֹ <WH1847> By his knowledge תְּהוֹמ֣וֹת <WH8415> the depths נִבְקָ֑עוּ <WH1234> are broken up וּ֝שְׁחָקִ֗ים <WH7834> and the clouds יִרְעֲפוּ־ <WH7491> drop down טָֽל׃ <WH2919> the dew

בְּ֭נִי <WH1121> My son אַל־ <WH408> nay יָלֻ֣זוּ <WH3868> let not them depart מֵעֵינֶ֑יךָ <WH5869> from thine eyes נְצֹ֥ר <WH5341> keep תֻּ֝שִׁיָּ֗ה <WH8454> sound wisdom וּמְזִמָּֽה׃ <WH4209> and discretion
וְיִֽהְי֣וּ <WH1961> become חַיִּ֣ים <WH2416> So shall they be life לְנַפְשֶׁ֑ךָ <WH5315> unto thy soul וְ֝חֵ֗ן <WH2580> and grace לְגַרְגְּרֹתֶֽיךָ׃ <WH1621> to thy neck
אָ֤ז <WH227> Then תֵּלֵ֣ךְ <WH1980> will walk לָבֶ֣טַח <WH983> safely דַּרְכֶּ֑ךָ <WH1870> in thy way וְ֝רַגְלְךָ֗ <WH7272> and thy foot לֹ֣א <WH3808> will not תִגּֽוֹף׃ <WH5062> shall not stumble

אִם־ <WH518> When תִּשְׁכַּ֥ב <WH7901> When thou liest down לֹֽא־ <WH3808> not תִפְחָ֑ד <WH6342> thou shalt not be afraid וְ֝שָׁכַבְתָּ֗ <WH7901> yea thou shalt lie down וְֽעָרְבָ֥ה <WH6149> shall be sweet שְׁנָתֶֽךָ׃ <WH8142> and thy sleep

אַל־ <WH408> Nor תִּ֭ירָא <WH3372> Be not afraid מִפַּ֣חַד <WH6343> fear פִּתְאֹ֑ם <WH6597> of sudden וּמִשֹּׁאַ֥ת <WH7722> neither of the desolation רְ֝שָׁעִ֗ים <WH7563> of the wicked כִּ֣י <WH3588> when תָבֹֽא׃ <WH935> when it cometh

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> For יְ֭הוָה <WH3068> For the LORD יִהְיֶ֣ה <WH1961> become בְכִסְלֶ֑ךָ <WH3689> shall be thy confidence וְשָׁמַ֖ר <WH8104> and shall keep רַגְלְךָ֣ <WH7272> thy foot מִלָּֽכֶד׃ <WH3921> from being taken אַל־ <WH408> nay תִּמְנַע־ <WH4513> deny

ט֥וֹב <WH2896> not good מִבְּעָלָ֑יו <WH1167> from them to whom it is due בִּהְי֨וֹת <WH1961> is in לְאֵ֖ל <WH410> when it is in the power [יָדֶיךָ כ] (יָדְךָ֣ <WH3027> able ק) לַעֲשֽׂוֹת׃ <WH6213> to do

אַל־ <WH408> not תֹּ֘אמַ֤ר <WH559> Say [לְרֵעֶיךָ כ] (לְרֵֽעֲךָ֨ <WH7453> brother ק) לֵ֣ךְ <WH1980> Go וָ֭שׁוּב <WH7725> and come again וּמָחָ֥ר <WH4279> and to morrow אֶתֵּ֗ן <WH5414> I will give וְיֵ֣שׁ <WH3426> when thou hast אִתָּֽךְ׃ <WH854> for

אַל־ <WH408> nay תַּחֲרֹ֣שׁ <WH7451> not evil עַל־ <WH5921> against רֵעֲךָ֣ <WH7453> against thy neighbour רָעָ֑ה <WH2790> Devise וְהֽוּא־ <WH1931> he יוֹשֵׁ֖ב <WH3427> seeing he dwelleth לָבֶ֣טַח <WH983> securely אִתָּֽךְ׃ <WH854> beside

אַל־ <WH408> nay [תָּרֹוב כ] (תָּרִ֣יב <WH7378> adversary ק) עִם־ <WH5973> with אָדָ֣ם <WH120> not with a man חִנָּ֑ם <WH2600> without cause אִם־ <WH518> If לֹ֖א <WH3808> no גְמָלְךָ֣ <WH1580> if he have done רָעָֽה׃ <WH7451> thee no harm

אַל־ <WH408> not תְּ֭קַנֵּא <WH7065> Envy בְּאִ֣ישׁ <WH376> A man חָמָ֑ס <WH2555> of violence וְאַל־ <WH408> not תִּ֝בְחַ֗ר <WH977> and choose בְּכָל־ <WH3605> any דְּרָכָֽיו׃ <WH1870> none of his ways

כִּ֤י <WH3588> for תוֹעֲבַ֣ת <WH8441> [is] abomination יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> to the LORD נָל֑וֹז <WH3868> For the froward וְֽאֶת־ <WH853> יְשָׁרִ֥ים <WH3477> [is] with the righteous סוֹדֽוֹ׃ <WH5475> but his secret

מְאֵרַ֣ת <WH3994> The curse יְ֭הוָה <WH3068> of the LORD בְּבֵ֣ית <WH1004> [is] in the house רָשָׁ֑ע <WH7563> of the wicked וּנְוֵ֖ה <WH5116> the habitation צַדִּיקִ֣ים <WH6662> of the just יְבָרֵֽךְ׃ <WH1288> but he blesseth

אִם־ <WH518> Though לַלֵּצִ֥ים <WH3887> Surely he scorneth הֽוּא־ <WH1931> he יָלִ֑יץ <WH3887> the scorners [וְלַעֲנִיִּים כ] (וְ֝לַעֲנָוִ֗ים <WH6041> afflicted ק) יִתֶּן־ <WH5414> but he giveth חֵֽן׃ <WH2580> grace
כָּ֭בוֹד <WH3519> glory חֲכָמִ֣ים <WH2450> The wise יִנְחָ֑לוּ <WH5157> shall inherit וּ֝כְסִילִ֗ים <WH3684> of fools מֵרִ֥ים <WH7311> shall be the promotion קָלֽוֹן׃ <WH7036> but shame פ
